dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6843 IH: To expand the boundaries of the Atchafalaya National Heritage Area to include Lafourche Parish, Louisiana.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Scalise (for himself, Mr. Graves of Louisiana, Ms. Letlow, Mr. Higgins of Louisiana, and Mr. Carter of Louisiana) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To expand the boundaries of the Atchafalaya National Heritage Area to include Lafourche Parish, Louisiana.

section.text: Section 213 of the Atchafalaya National Heritage Area Act (subtitle B of title II of Public Law 109–338) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (b), by striking and Ascension Parish and inserting Ascension, and Lafourche Parish; and
in subsection (c)(2), by striking 14 and inserting 15.
